Template.name: sap.ui.suite.TaskCircle
Template.jsTemplate: new sap.ui.suite.TaskCircle({ id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID busy: false, // boolean busyIndicatorDelay: 1000, // int visible: true, // boolean value: 0, // int maxValue: 100, // int minValue: 0, // int color: sap.ui.suite.TaskCircleColor.Gray, // sap.ui.suite.TaskCircleColor tooltip: undefined, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase customData: [], // sap.ui.core.CustomData dependents: [], // sap.ui.core.Control, since 1.19 ariaLabelledBy: [], // sap.ui.core.Control ariaDescribedBy: [], // sap.ui.core.Control press: [function (oEvent) { var ${control} = oEvent.getSource(); }, this] })
Template.xmlTemplate: <TaskCircle xmlns="sap.ui.suite" id="${id}" busy="false" busyIndicatorDelay="1000" visible="true" value="0" maxValue="100" minValue="0" color="Gray" ariaLabelledBy="" ariaDescribedBy="" press=""> <tooltip></tooltip> <!-- sap.ui.core.TooltipBase --> <dependents></dependents> <!-- sap.ui.core.Control, since 1.19 --> </TaskCircle>

Template.name: sap.ui.suite.VerticalProgressIndicator
Template.xmlTemplate: <VerticalProgressIndicator xmlns="sap.ui.suite" id="${id}" busy="false" busyIndicatorDelay="1000" visible="true" percentage="" ariaLabelledBy="" ariaDescribedBy="" press=""> <tooltip></tooltip> <!-- sap.ui.core.TooltipBase --> <dependents></dependents> <!-- sap.ui.core.Control, since 1.19 --> </VerticalProgressIndicator>
